name: Colored Squared [My First Game]
description:
Welcome to My First Game!!!!

Blue Screen is Main Menu. When you saw it, press SPACE to start.

Then you enter the game and you are the blue square (totally not because I was too lazy to make textures) and you can move with A and D keys or LEFT and RIGHT arrow.

Try to avoid red squares. if you touch them, you will end up in a Red Screen. But worry not.  You can start over with SPACE key.

Your goal is to collect 200 gold squares and get to Gold Screen, then you win! (It is possible. Don't worry)

Well, Congrats. You know how to play. Now Play if you want (It is completely free. I don't even need donation. Anyway, Bye)
